TopicTitle: How do I make an EVE cloud map?

Articles.Content:
I am a complete beginner to making custom EVE content, and I want to use clouds to enhance my planet pack Precursors. I've been looking for a step-by-step tutorial on how to make an EVE cloud map for a long time, but I haven't been able to find anything. Every custom texture I've tried to make fails to load in-game.

  • How do I make a cloud texture for use with EVE?
    • What file type should I use?
    • Do I need to use alpha channels? How exactly do I do that?
    • Is this process supposed to be really easy?
    • Where are some additional resources I can look at?

I'm very stumped and frustrated. Any help would be appreciated. Thanks!
